alert.note: Alert for Forrest; Jones; Lamar (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 02 at 1:24AM CST until January 02 at 2:15AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Forrest County in southeastern Mississippi... Northeastern Lamar County in southeastern Mississippi... Southern Jones County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 215 AM CST. * At 123 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over West Hattiesburg, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Oak Grove around 130 AM CST. Petal and Eastabuchie around 135 AM CST. Sunrise around 140 AM CST. Macedonia around 145 AM CST. Ovett around 200 AM CST. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
